Reviews.Title: Awesome price for awesome computer
Reviews.Author: Terry M. Day
Reviews.Content: We bought this laptop because our  desktop went on the blink.  So far we are able to do the things we need to do.  Awesome price for a very capable computer.

Reviews.Title: HP TouchSmart Laptop
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Klick
Reviews.Content: Love my new Laptop ! My last computer was an HP Desk-Top which lasted 12 years. Still getting use to my new Laptop with Windows 8 which again I just Love !

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Erin LaRock
Reviews.Content: My old lap top died on me and I really wanted a touch screen without breaking the bank. Got this one mid Feb. on sale for 380$.  Windows 8 has taken a little getting used to. Absolutely love the touchscreen!  The picture on my 52" HDTV hooked up with HDMI is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: rating
Reviews.Author: doctor
Reviews.Content: The prouct does not look genuine it is a counterfiet. The product would have been so nice if its original. I wanted to return it but I really needed a laptop badly as at the time I received it so I decided to manage it like that.
